name: The Island of Dr. Yepstein
description:
The Island of Dr. Yepstein — an uncompromising action-packed first-person shooter set on a tropical island paradise.
The player in the role of a super cool special forces will have to meet face to face with dangerous enemies and unravel all the secrets of the mysterious island.

Rumors of inhuman experiments are coming from a remote island in the Pacific Ocean.

A special forces squad, represented by one protagonist, is sent to the island of Kok-sak to destroy evidence and restore justice after the recent scandal that erupted in the press.

After the death of the doctor on the mainland, the test subjects on the island decided to found their own state. They were led by the transgender leader of a religious sect, now known as Madam Sir-Gay. The newly minted government cut off all communications with the rest of the world by shutting down 5g towers on the island.

Your task is to weaken the religious mood of the radicals, as well as find and kill Madam Sir-Gay.

Features:
- smart enemies
- bloodthirsty mutants
- dangerous anomalies
- realistic helicopter controls
- amazing graphics
- huge spaces
